# Pinned harness dependencies for the public benchmarks repo.
#
# Note: NextStat itself is expected to be installed separately (wheel or pip package),
# because benchmark snapshots must pin the *exact* NextStat build being measured.

pyhf==0.7.6
numpy==2.2.3
jsonschema==4.25.1
pydantic==2.10.6
rich==13.9.4
